homePage.description: Work Now is a platform for job and employee search. Create resumes and vacancies, select employees and get a job fast

authPage.description: The WorkNow login page allows you to easily and securely login into your account.
authPage.title: WorkNow / Login

authResetPage.title: WorkNow / Password Reset
authResetPage.description: On the WorkNow reset password page, you can quickly and securely regain access to your account

authUpdatePasswordPage.description: The WorkNow update password page allows you to easily and securely update your account password.
authUpdatePasswordPage.title: WorkNow / Update Password

vacancyCreationPage.title: WorkNow / Create a vacancy
vacancyCreationPage.description: WorkNow's goal is to help you create a professional and attractive vacancy that will open doors to new opportunities and qualitatively expand your staff.

vacancyDetailsPage.title: WorkNow / Job Details
vacancyDetailsPage.description: WorkNow features detailed job postings to help you find your perfect job

vacanciesListPage.title: WorkNow / Job List
vacanciesListPage.description: WorkNow has a wide range of jobs for a variety of industries and skill levels. Our goal is to help you find the perfect job.

resumesListPage.title: WorkNow / Resume List
resumesListPage.description: On WorkNow you will find a wide range of resumes suitable for various fields and skill levels. Our goal is to help you find the perfect candidate.

lkVacanciesPage.description: On WorkNow's My Vacancies page, you can easily manage all your jobs in one place.
lkVacanciesPage.title: WorkNow / My Vacancies

pageNotFound.title: Page not found
pageNotFound.description: Unfortunately, the page you requested could not be found.

resumeDetailsPage.title: WorkNow / Resume Details
resumeDetailsPage.description: WorkNow features detailed candidate resumes to help you find the perfect fit for your team.

resumeCreationPage.title: WorkNow / Resume Creation
resumeCreationPage.description: WorkNow's goal is to help you create a professional and attractive resume that will open doors to new career opportunities.

lkResumesPage.title: WorkNow / My Resumes
lkResumesPage.description: On WorkNow's My Resumes page, you can easily manage all your resumes in one place.

lkHomePage.title: WorkNow / Personal account
lkHomePage.description: On the WorkNow personal account page, you will have access to all the functions and settings of your account

lkFavoritesPage.title: WorkNow / My Favorites
lkFavoritesPage.description: On the WorkNow My Favorites page, you can easily manage your favorites (resumes/jobs) and access them at any time.

lkDetailsPage.title: WorkNow / My Profile
lkDetailsPage.description: On the WorkNow My Profile page, you can manage your personal information and customize your account settings.

lkApplicationsPage.title: WorkNow / My applies
lkApplicationsPage.description: On the WorkNow My Applies page, you can view and manage your responses to resumes or jobs.
